name: SigSci - excessive http 5xx errors
message: Signal Sciences Web Application Firewall has been detecting a higher number of 5xx errors than normal. An increase in server errors (such as 500, 503, 504, etc.) can indicate your infrastructure is becoming overloaded or that there has been a recent code push that is causing errors. Details are available in your Signal Sciences console at https://dashboard.signalsciences.net/.

recommended_monitor_metadata.description: Notify your team when Signal Sciences Web Application Firewall has been detecting a higher number of 5xx errors than normal.
